application.name: MComix
application.summary: Comic and general purpose image viewer

description.p: MComix is an user-friendly, customizable image viewer. It is specifically designed to handle comic books, but also serves as a generic viewer. It reads images in various archive formats such as ZIP, RAR, 7Zip, LHA or tar/gz/bz2, archives as well as plain image files.
MComix is a fork of the Comix project, and aims to add bug fixes and stability improvements after Comix development came to a halt in late 2009.
